dmca.title: Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
dmca.body:
Dear Legal Support:

I am writing this letter on behalf of Forsalebyowner.com. We believe that our copyrighted work has been copied and is accessible on Google's site in a way that constitutes copyright infringement. This letter is to notify you of this infringement by providing your copyright agent with the following information:

	1. the electronic or physical signature of the owner of the copyright or the person authorized to
act on the owner's behalf.	'

Jamie Rzucek - 
	2a. a description of the copyrighted work that you claim has been infringed and a description of the infringing activity.

Our customers pay us to post a description of their home online, so they may sell it "FSBO" (forsalebyowner). Some of the documents that we wrote and use to support this service have been stolen, modified slightly, and then posted by another site (byowner.com) . They have taken material we have written and posted it as their own material without ever asking us for permission. Byowner.com is presenting our material as their copyrighted materials.

In addition, we have a marketing agreement with HomeDepot to offer rebates to our customers. Byowner has stolen the graphic image we use and is presenting it as their graphic.

	2b. FOR WEB SEARCH, YOU MUST IDENTIFY EACH SEARCH RESULT THAT DIRECTLY LINKS TO A WEB PAGE THAT ALLEGEDLY CONTAINS INFRINGING MATERIAL. This requires you to provide

(a) the search query that you used, and

Case 1:"REASONS WHY LISTING YOUR HOME "FSBO" MAKES SENSE"

Google Search Results: Results 1 - 2 of about 4 for "REASONS WHY LISTING YOUR HOME "FSBO" MAKES SENSE". (0.46 seconds):

Original material: www.forsalebyowner.com/fsbo.html
- 22k - Cached - Similar pages
Stolen material: : http://forsale.byowner.com/fsbo.html
- 62k - Cached - Similar pages
 
CASE 2:

Google Search: you've taken the most important step toward the smartest financial decision a property seller can make

Original Material: www.forsalebyowner.com/place-listinq.php?or=int - 68k - May 10, 2006 - Cached - Similar pages

Stolen Material: www.canadabyowner.com/listnow/index.aspx - 116k - Cached - Similar pages

CASE 3:

Gooqle search: Until Sold Plan: Price is a one-time flat rate


Original Material: www.forsalebyowner.com/place-listing.php?or=int - 68k - May 10, 2006 - Cached - Similar pages

Stolen Material: www.canadabyowner.com/listnow/index.aspx - 116k - Cached - Similar pages

CASE 4:

Google Search: We can provide homebuilders with professional signage and MLS listings.


Original Material: www.forsalebyowner.com/builder/

Stolen Material: Stolen Material URL 1: http://www.byowner.com/builder/builders.pdf Stolen Material URL 2: http://www.1800byowner.com/builder/index.asp Stolen Material URL 3: http://forsale.byowner.com/builder/index.asp

Stolen Material URL 4: http://www.byowner.com/builder/index.asp


3a. identification of the location where the original or an authorized copy of the copyriqhted work exists, for example the URL of the website where it is posted or the name of the book in which it has been published.
a.) ITEM ONE: Thirteen Reasons Why Every Builder Should Work With ForSaleByOwner.com

Original Material URL: http://www.forsalebyowner.com/builder/fsbobuilderkit.pdf Stolen Material URL 1: http://www.byowner.com/builder/builders.pdf Stolen Material URL 2: http://www.1800byowner.com/builder/index.asp Stolen Material URL 3: http://forsale.byowner.com/builder/index.asp Stolen Material URL 4: http://www.byowner.com/builder/index.asp
 
b.)	ITEM TWO: What is FSBO? Original Material URL: http://www.forsalebyowner.com/fsbo Stolen Material URL: http://forsale.byowner.com/fsbo.html

(Some of our content on http://www.forsalebyowner.com/fsbo has been updated; you can use archive.org for evidence to see that byowner.com took this material off our site and is posting it on their site right now.

c.)	ITEM Three: Create a new Listing
